name: Darkness Cube 01
effect: Attach this card to 1 of your {D} Pokémon in play. That Pokémon may use this card’s attack instead of its own. At the end of your turn, discard Darkness Cube 01.
author: “Big Mama” Tagawa

attacks.name: Plunder
attacks.effect: Before doing damage, discard any Trainer cards attached to the Defending Pokémon.
